title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3579/91 of 25 November 1991 on the application of Decision No 3/91 of the EEC-Jordan Cooperation Council amending, as a consequence of the introduction of the harmonized system, Protocol 2 concerning the definition of the concept of 'originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
header:
14.12.1991 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 345/1
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 3579/91
of 25 November 1991
on the application of Decision No 3/91 of the EEC-Jordan Cooperation Council amending, as a consequence of the introduction of the harmonized system, Protocol 2 concerning the definition of the concept of ‘originating products’ and methods of administrative cooperation
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision No 3/91 of the EEC-Jordan Cooperation Council shall apply in the Community.
The text of the Decision is attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1992.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 November 1991.
For the Council
The President
J. M. M. RITZEN
(1)  OJ No L 268, 27. 9. 1978, p. 2.
